articles.title: Romanian man appears in court in connection with the murder of Francis Dunne - Cork Beo
articles.description: The 29-year-old was arrested on foot of a European Arrest Warrant
articles.content:
A Romanian man in his late twenties has appeared before a special sitting of a Cork court charged in connection with the murder of a 64 year old father of three in the city in December 2019.

articles.title: Emmanuel Macron elbows UK aside as he seals €17bn fighter jet deal with UAE - Telegraph.co.uk

articles.title: Expect Harmony OS phones to go global, new Mate in 2022 - Android Authority
articles.description: A Huawei executive has confirmed that Harmony OS phones are coming to Europe next year. He added that the next Mate phones will land in 2022.
articles.content:
